name: dolibarr
description: Dolibarr is an open-source ERP and CRM suite aimed at small and medium businesses. It includes modules for invoicing, accounting, inventory, HR, projects, and more, enabling companies to centralize operations in a self-hosted web interface.

features.title: Customer Management
features.description: Track contacts, companies, and sales opportunities with integrated CRM tools for relationship building

features.title: Invoicing System
features.description: Generate quotes, orders, and invoices with customizable templates and automated payment tracking

features.title: Inventory Control
features.description: Manage stock levels, warehouses, and product catalogs with barcode support and reorder alerts

features.title: Project Tracking
features.description: Plan tasks, allocate resources, and monitor project progress with time logging and milestone management

features.title: Accounting Integration
features.description: Record transactions, manage bank accounts, and generate financial reports for business oversight

features.title: Hr Management
features.description: Handle employee records, leave requests, and expense reports within the unified platform

features.title: Modular Architecture
features.description: Enable only the features your business needs by activating specific modules from the extensive library

features.title: Multi
features.description: Operate in over 50 languages with localized interfaces and currency handling for global businesses
